sys: Beautiful Munich 2018: Beautiful Munich 2018 in Hvar: Nine Dates
ref: The Beauty of Munich 2018: the Beauty of Munich 2018 in Hvar: Nine dates
srcsent: Schöne Münchnerin 2018: Schöne Münchnerin 2018 in Hvar: Neun Dates

ref: to become "The Beauty of Munich" in 2018!

sys: In the afternoon, another surprise awaits our candidates: they will not contest the romantic candlelight shoot in front of MY SOLARIS alone, but at the side of Male model Fabian!
ref: In the afternoon there is another surprise waiting for our contestants: they will be competing for the romantic candlelight photo shoot at MY SOLARIS not alone, but together with a male-model Fabian!
srcsent: Am Nachmittag wartet erneut eine Überraschung auf unsere Kandidatinnen: sie werden das romantische Candlelight-Shooting vor der MY SOLARIS nicht alleine bestreiten, sondern an der Seite von Male-Model Fabian!

sys: Hvar - flirting, flirting, seducing - no easy tasks for our girls.
ref: Hvar with its flirting, coquetting, and seduction is not an easy task for our girls.
srcsent: Hvar - Flirten, kokettieren, verführen - keine einfachen Aufgaben für unsere Mädchen.

sys: Especially when a friend is waiting in Germany.
ref: Especially when there is a boyfriend waiting in Germany.
srcsent: Insbesondere dann, wenn in Deutschland ein Freund wartet.

sys: Still, the nine "Beautiful Munich" contestants deliver on the shoot with People photographer Tuan, defying wind, spray and rain like real professionals.
ref: Despite dealing with wind, sprays and rain, the nine contestants of "The Beauty of Munich" behaved like real professionals at the photo shoot with People-photographer Tuan.
srcsent: Dennoch liefern die neun "Schöne Münchnerin"-Kandidatinnen beim Shooting mit People-Fotograf Tuan ab und trotzen Wind, Gischt und Regen wie echte Profis.

sys: The romantic shoot can be seen in the video:
ref: You may watch the romantic photoshoot on the video:
srcsent: Das romantische Shooting gibt's im Video:

sys: DFB chief Grindel sees no basis for Özil comeback
ref: The president of DFB Grindel sees no basis for the returning of Özil
srcsent: DFB-Chef Grindel sieht keine Grundlage für Özil-Comeback
